channel.title: 纽约时报-全球
channel.description: 这是一个追踪纽约时报-全球news的种子

item.title: 周日，在巴布亚新几内亚偏远的高原地区发生了一场枪战，造成二十多人死亡。最近这起事件的确切原因仍不清楚。
item.description: More than two dozen people were killed in a gunfight on Sunday in the remote highlands of Papua New Guinea, where deadly violence between more than a dozen tribal groups has been escalating. The precise cause of the latest episode remained unclear. nyti.ms/3T0PR82

item.title: 上周五，阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼在北极偏远地区的监狱中去世，成千上万的俄罗斯人试图表达对他的哀思，而俄罗斯警察则进行了镇压，暂时拘留了数百人，并将二十多人关进监狱。
item.description: As thousands of Russians tried to give voice to their grief for Aleksei Navalny, who died in a remote Arctic penal colony on Friday, Russian police officers cracked down, temporarily detaining hundreds of people and placing more than two dozen in jail. nyti.ms/49CzmEt

item.title: 过去三天，西方国家领导人齐聚慕尼黑，弗拉基米尔-普京总统向他们传达了一个信息：他们迄今所做的一切都不会改变普京破坏当前世界秩序的意图。
item.description: As the leaders of the West gathered in Munich over the past three days, President Vladimir Putin had a message for them: Nothing they’ve done so far would alter his intentions to disrupt the current world order. nyti.ms/3T3jIN4

item.title: 阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的去世让世界各国领导人和示威者悲痛不已，但同时也让俄罗斯失去了一个有魅力的抗衡者，来对抗弗拉基米尔-普京总统日益加剧的镇压政策。
item.description: Aleksei Navalny’s death united world leaders and demonstrators in grief, but it also left Russia without a charismatic counterweight to President Vladimir Putin’s increasingly repressive policies. nyti.ms/3Td4SE1

item.title: 夺取阿夫迪夫卡后，乌克兰部队需要在不平坦的地形上建立新的防线，而俄罗斯则试图扩大优势。
item.description: After the capture of Avdiivka, Ukrainian forces will need a new defensive line in unforgiving terrain, while Russia tries to press its advantage. nyti.ms/49i38yx

item.title: 阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼在俄罗斯监狱中死亡，这对以他为代表的反对派运动是一个打击。但这也为建立反对弗拉基米尔-普京总统的统一战线带来了希望。
item.description: The death of Aleksei Navalny in a Russian prison has been a blow to an opposition movement in which he was the figurehead. But it has also raised hopes of a united front against President Vladimir Putin. nyti.ms/3T1SAy1

item.title: 在加拿大一个率先减少伤害的省份，一个城市就可能建立安全消费场所的问题举行了一场激烈的辩论。
item.description: In a Canadian province that pioneered harm reduction, one city held a raucous debate over the possible creation of a safe consumption site. nyti.ms/49B9h8N

item.title: 在以色列占领的约旦河西岸举办的一个展览展出了加沙艺术家的作品，这些作品唤起了人们对巴勒斯坦生活和抗议的回忆。但是，这次展览也同样展出了因战争而永远消失的无法展出的艺术作品。
item.description: An exhibition in the Israeli-occupied West Bank features works by Gazan artists evoking Palestinian life and protest. But the show is as much about the art that cannot be displayed, lost forever to the war. nyti.ms/49jl38g

item.title: 在俄罗斯的长期进攻接近尾声时，仍有数百名平民留在阿夫迪夫卡。那些在最后几周逃出来的人讲述了无情的破坏。
item.description: Toward the end of Russia’s long assault, hundreds of civilians still remained in Avdiivka. Those who escaped in the last weeks spoke of relentless devastation. nyti.ms/49lcWYG

item.title: 周六，一名巴基斯坦高级官员承认帮助操纵了该国的选举结果--这一令人震惊的说法使人们更加感到这次投票是巴基斯坦历史上最不可信的选举之一。
item.description: A senior Pakistani official confessed on Saturday to helping manipulate results in the country’s elections — a startling claim strengthening a sense that the vote was among the least credible in Pakistan’s history. nyti.ms/49jE4HE

item.title: 泰国假释了他信-西那瓦（Thaksin Shinawatra），这位下台的前总理因腐败和滥用权力的指控而被定罪。他最近的举动让追随者们心灰意冷。
item.description: Thailand has paroled Thaksin Shinawatra, the ousted former prime minister who was convicted on charges of corruption and abuse of power. His recent moves have disillusioned followers. nyti.ms/49g6UJ5

item.title: 以色列总理本雅明-内塔尼亚胡周六坚称，以色列不会屈服于国际压力，取消地面入侵拉法的计划。
item.description: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu insisted on Saturday that Israel would not bow to international pressure to call off its plan for a ground invasion of Rafah, the southernmost city in Gaza that is now packed with more than a million Palestinians. nyti.ms/3wlPw6W

item.title: 周六，数千名反政府示威者挤满了特拉维夫市中心的一条大道，这是几个月来对本雅明-内塔尼亚胡总理最大规模的愤怒示威。
item.description: Thousands of antigovernment protesters on Saturday filled a central Tel Aviv thoroughfare in the largest show of anger toward Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu in months. nyti.ms/3UL60jd

item.title: 虽然 Aleksei A. Navalny 的死因不详，但他的工作人员经常担心，在越来越残酷的监狱中强加给他的残酷条件可能会导致他的死亡。
item.description: Although Aleksei A. Navalny’s cause of death is not known, his staff often worried that brutal conditions imposed on him in ever crueler prisons might lead to his death. nyti.ms/49jdMVY

item.title: 沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基总统回击了对乌克兰胜利的怀疑，呼吁世界各国领导人不要问战争何时结束，而是要问为什么俄罗斯仍能发动战争。
item.description: President Volodymyr Zelensky pushed back against skepticism of a Ukraine victory, calling on world leaders not to ask when the war would end, but why Russia was still able to wage it. nyti.ms/42LfD3j

item.title: 一个人权组织报告说，自阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼去世以来，俄罗斯各地至少有 359 人被拘留。连续第二天，人们来到莫斯科的一个简易纪念碑前献花。
item.description: At least 359 people have been detained across Russia since Aleksei Navalny’s death, a rights group reported. For the second day in a row, people came to lay flowers at an improvised memorial in Moscow. nyti.ms/49DBKLd

item.title: 俄罗斯的进攻分为五条主攻路线，兵力不足的乌克兰地面部队试图抵挡俄罗斯的进攻。
item.description: Russia’s assault has split into five major lines of attack, as the outgunned and outmanned Ukrainian ground forces try to hold it back. nyti.ms/3OLq2Gx

item.title: 非洲正在兴起一股以 L.G.B.T.Q. 经历为中心的图书热潮。"我知道我想写的人物都是同性恋，"作家 Arinze Ifeakandu 说。"只有这样，我才能出现在书页上"。
item.description: Africa is seeing a boom in books that center L.G.B.T.Q. experiences. “I knew I wanted to write characters who are queer,” said author Arinze Ifeakandu. “That’s the only way I am going to show up on the page.” nyti.ms/3ONZCDV

item.title: 去年在中国举行的科幻小说雨果奖颁奖典礼上，一些图书明显缺席，作家和书迷对此产生了怀疑。泄露的电子邮件给出了一些答案。
item.description: When some books were conspicuously absent from the science fiction Hugo Awards held in China last year, writers and fans became suspicious. Leaked emails have offered some answers. nyti.ms/48jj8zi.

item.title: 俄罗斯攻占了顿涅茨克地区乌克兰防御据点的废墟城市阿夫迪夫卡，对乌克兰造成了重大的战略和象征性打击。
item.description: Russia’s capture of Avdiivka, a ruined city that had been a stronghold of Ukrainian defenses in the Donetsk region, deals Ukraine a significant strategic and symbolic blow. nyti.ms/48lqQbS

item.title: 尽管美国施加了压力，但建立巴勒斯坦国的想法似乎比以往任何时候都更加遥远，因为以色列的犹太人在向右转，而巴勒斯坦人则担心会遭到反击。
item.description: Despite U.S. pressure, the idea of a Palestinian state seems farther away than ever, as Israel’s Jews move rightward and its Palestinians fear a backlash. nyti.ms/3wlrucf

item.title: 保罗-贝南蒂修士就人工智能的伦理问题向梵蒂冈和意大利政府提出建议，当机器似乎更有生命力、更有人性时，他运用自己对生命和人性的看法。"他说："这是一个精神问题。
item.description: El fraile Paolo Benanti asesora al Vaticano y al gobierno italiano sobre la ética de la IA aplicando su visión de la vida y la humanidad cuando parece que las máquinas están más vivas y son más humanas. “Se trata de una cuestión espiritual”, dijo. nyti.ms/3UITdxy

item.title: 保罗-贝南蒂（Paolo Benanti）是一名牧师，他是梵蒂冈和意大利政府的人工智能伦理学家。
item.description: Paolo Benanti, an ordained priest, is the go-to artificial intelligence ethicist for both the Vatican and the Italian government. nyti.ms/3SQjtVE

item.title: 以色列总理本雅明-内塔尼亚胡命令以色列军方制定一项计划，让在拉法避难的平民撤离，为预计向这座拥挤城市发动的进攻扫清道路。
item.description: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu ordered the Israeli military to come up with a plan for civilians sheltering in Rafah to evacuate, clearing the way for an expected offensive into the crowded city. nyti.ms/3wexzar

item.title: 俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京在接受前福克斯新闻主持人塔克-卡尔森（Tucker Carlson）长达两小时的迂回采访时，不断重复着一个信息：俄罗斯希望通过谈判达成乌克兰和平协议。但批评人士认为，这一信息含糊不清。
item.description: President Vladimir Putin of Russia kept returning to one message over and over in his meandering, two-hour interview with the former Fox News host Tucker Carlson: Russia wants to negotiate a peace deal in Ukraine. But the message was muddled, critics say. nyti.ms/3wccTQj

item.title: 一部关于同性恋足球运动员的新纪录片讲述了一个在某些方面已经不再是故事的故事。
item.description: A new documentary about gay players in soccer tells a story that is, in some ways, no longer a story. nyti.ms/4bu45FJ

item.title: 哈里王子的律师周五告诉伦敦一家法院，哈里王子已经解决了他对英国一家小报出版商提出的隐私权索赔，两个月前，法官裁定该出版商犯有 "广泛和习惯性 "黑客攻击王子手机的罪行。
item.description: Prince Harry has settled his privacy claims against a British tabloid publisher, his lawyer told a London court on Friday, two months after a judge found the publisher guilty of “widespread and habitual” hacking of the prince’s cellphone. nyti.ms/3SQrIkw

item.title: 泰勒狂热登陆东京。但一些随她而来的斯威夫特人的热情却与当地人的感性发生了冲突。
item.description: Taylor mania has landed in Tokyo. But the enthusiasm of some of the Swifties arriving with her has clashed with local sensibilities. nyti.ms/3UCq4nM

item.title: 在奥莱克桑德-瑟尔斯基将军就任乌克兰最高军事指挥官之际，他可能很快会再次面临严峻的考验：什么时候守卫阵地的代价会超过给敌人造成痛苦所带来的任何好处？
item.description: As Gen. Oleksandr Syrsky assumes his role as Ukraine’s top military commander, he could soon be confronted again with a grim calculus: When does the cost of defending ground outweigh any benefit gained by inflicting pain on the enemy? nyti.ms/3SPvASG

item.title: 弗拉基米尔-普京总统呼吁美国 "与俄罗斯谈判 "以结束乌克兰战争，他在周四播出的采访中与前福克斯新闻主持人进行了长达两小时的交谈。
item.description: President Vladimir Putin called on the United States to “negotiate with Russia” to end the war in Ukraine, speaking for two hours with a former Fox News host in an interview broadcast on Thursday. nyti.ms/48a5Xk3
